1.text: Please call the oncology nurses today at (859) 562-2386 (for CT surgery patients) or UK Markey Cancer Center (859) 257-4488 during regular business hours (M-F, 8am-5pm). If you need to speak with someone outside regular business hours, please call the UK Paging Operator at (859)323-5321.

2.text: Please call the oncology social workers today at (859) 323-2798 during regular business hours (M-F, 8am-5pm). If you need to speak with someone outside regular business hours, please call the UK Paging Operator at (859)323-5321.

3.text: Please call the oncology nurses today at (859) 562-2386 (for CT surgery patients) or UK Markey Cancer Center (859) 257-4488 during regular business hours (M-F, 8am-5pm). If you need to speak with someone outside regular business hours, please call the UK Paging Operator at (859)323-5321. If you cannot reach a provider, please seek emergency medical care (911 or urgent care).

4.text: Please call the oncology nurses today at (859) 562-2386 (for CT surgery patients) or UK Markey Cancer Center (859) 257-4488 during regular business hours (M-F, 8am-5pm). If you need to speak with someone outside regular business hours, please call the UK Paging Operator at (859)323-5321. If you are having thoughts of harming yourself, please call 800.273.TALK(8255).

5.text: An oncology social worker will contact you at their earliest convenience. The number for the oncology social worker is (859)323-2798. If you need to speak with someone outside regular business hours, please call the UK Paging Operator at (859)323-5321.

6.text: An oncology social worker will send you some information at their earliest convenience. The number for the oncology social worker is (859)323-2798. If you need to speak with someone outside regular business hours, please call the UK Paging Operator at (859)323-5321.

7.text: Please discuss this with your provider at your next visit. A reminder will be entered into your medical record.

8.text: Thank you for sharing. Your data has been forwarded.
